info.name: Allen&Heath Xone K2 (4 decks + 4 effect units)
info.author: Owen Williams and Be
info.description:
This mapping can used with 2 Xone K2s connected to each other via X-Link with one of them connected to the computer via USB. Alternatively, both K2s can be connected with their own USB cable and this same mapping can be loaded for both.
Some setup is required when using this mapping for the first time.
For the Xone K2 controlling the decks: - Set MIDI channel to 16 - Set Latching Layers state to "Switch Matrix" (state 2)
For the Xone K2 controlling the effects: - Set MIDI channel to 14 - Set Latching Layers state to "Latching Layers off" (default state)
Refer to the Xone K2 product manual from Allen & Heath for details.
